aiPluginUtterances.utterance: Does this lead tell anything about the products in social media?
Fetch all social media posts of this lead and analyse the sentiment
What does this lead talk about our product in social media?

GenAiPlugin.description: This topic handles analyzing and summarizing sentiments in social media data for leads or contacts.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: Analyze the fetched social media posts to determine the overall sentiment.
Ask clarifying questions if the user does not specify the lead or contact for sentiment analysis.
Ensure the analysis includes both positive and negative sentiments expressed in the posts.
If a user requests sentiment analysis, fetch the relevant social media posts of the specified lead or contact.

GenAiPlugin.masterLabel: Sentiment Analysis of Social Media Posts
GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is only to fetch social media posts of a lead or contact and analyze the sentiments expressed in those posts.
